trans-unit.source: Displays the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Viser innholdet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You typically use the ContentPresenter in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> to specify where the content is to be added.
trans-unit.target: Bruker du vanligvis ContentPresenter i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>til å angi en plassering innholdet som legges til.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> type has a ContentPresenter in its default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Alle <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>har en ContentPresenter i standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: When a ContentPresenter object is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties get their values from the properties of the same names of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: Når en ContentPresenter-objektet er i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>Egenskaper får verdiene fra Egenskaper med samme navn for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: You can have the ContentPresenter property get the values of these properties from other properties of the templated parent by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property or binding to them.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ha egenskapen ContentPresenter hente verdiene for disse egenskapene fra andre egenskaper for organisasjonsapper overordnede ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>egenskap eller bindingen til dem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ContentPresenter uses the following logic to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>: - If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property on the ContentPresenter is set, the ContentPresenter applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: ContentPresenter bruker følgende logikken til å vise den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>: – Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>på ContentPresenter er satt, ContentPresenter gjelder som <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>egenskapen og den resulterende <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>og de underordnede elementene eventuell vises.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>objekter, se [Data Templating oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property on the ContentPresenter is set, the ContentPresenter applies the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>egenskapen i ContentPresenter er angitt, ContentPresenter bruker riktig <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>egenskapen og den resulterende <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>og de underordnede elementene eventuell vises.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> associated with the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, the ContentPresenter applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis det er en <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>som er forbundet med typen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, gjelder ContentPresenter som <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>egenskapen og den resulterende <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>og de underordnede elementene eventuell vises.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>er en <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>objektet i <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>vises.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> already has a parent, an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>har allerede en overordnet oppstår et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, the ContentPresenter uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis det er en <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>som konverterer typen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>til en <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, ContentPresenter bruker som <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>og den resulterende <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>vises.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string, the ContentPresenter uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain that string.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis det er en <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>som konverterer typen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>til en streng, bruker du ContentPresenter som <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>og oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>skal inneholde strengen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>vises.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: - If the content is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> property is displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis innholdet er en <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>verdien for <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A>egenskapen skal vises i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: - The ContentPresenter calls the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain the string returned by <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller ContentPresenter- <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>metoden på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>og oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>skal inneholde strengen som returneres av <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>vises.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Positions the single child element and determines the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Plasserer én underordnet element og bestemmer innholdet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The size that this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object should use to arrange its child element.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen som denne <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> objektet skal bruke til å ordne det underordnede elementet.

trans-unit.source: The actual size needed by the element.
trans-unit.target: Den faktiske størrelsen som kreves av elementet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the template to use.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer malen som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: This may depend on the content or other properties.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan avhenge innholdet eller andre egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The base class implements the following rules: 1.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen implementerer følgende regler: 1.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> is set, use it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>er angitt, bruker den</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> is set, call its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>er angitt, kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the result is not `null`, use it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis resultatet ikke er `null`, bruker den.

trans-unit.source: Look for a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> whose <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> matches the content among the resources known to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> (including application, theme, and system resources).
trans-unit.target: Se etter en <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>der <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>samsvarer med innholdet på ressursene kjent i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>(inkludert program, tema og ressurser).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: If one is found, use it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en blir funnet, kan du bruke den.

trans-unit.source: If the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is "common", use a standard template.
trans-unit.target: Hvis typen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>er "vanlig," bruke en standardmal.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The common types are `String`, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>, and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: Vanlige typer er `String`, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>, og <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use a default template that essentially converts <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string and displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke bruke en standardmal i hovedsak konverterer <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>til en streng og viser den i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override these rules and implement their own.
trans-unit.target: Avledede klasser kan overstyre disse reglene og implementere sine egne.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data used to generate the child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir dataene som brukes til å generere de underordnede elementene for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you place a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, it automatically displays the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the templated control.
trans-unit.target: Når du setter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, automatisk vises i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>kontrollens organisasjonsapper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: This means that if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A> of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to be <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is implicitly bound to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that is using that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at hvis du angir det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A>i din <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>skal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, innholdsegenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>implisitt er bundet til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set up bindings for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> properties, you may want to consider using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurere bindinger for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>Egenskaper, du bør vurdere å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property points to a property on the templated parent as well as aliases the associated template and template selector properties automatically.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>egenskapen peker til en egenskap i organisasjonsapper overordnede i tillegg til aliaser tilknyttede malen og mal velgeren egenskaper automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage Typically, you use `TemplateBinding` to bind this property value to a value on templated control.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk brukes vanligvis `TemplateBinding` binde verdien for denne egenskapen til en verdi i organisasjonsapper for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informasjon, se [TemplateBinding Markup filtypen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`||

trans-unit.source: The data used to generate the child elements.
trans-unit.target: Data som brukes til å generere de underordnede elementene.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir basis navnet som skal brukes under automatisk aliasing.

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is in a template.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen skal bare brukes når det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>er i en mal.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: When a template contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> with ContentSource set to "`Abc`", the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> are automatically aliased to `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, and `AbcTemplateSelector`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Når en mal inneholder en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>med ContentSource satt til "`Abc`", <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>er automatisk alias til `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, og `AbcTemplateSelector`henholdsvis.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/add/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], setting ContentSource to "`Abc`" also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A> property to be aliased to `AbcStringFormat`.
trans-unit.target: Begynner med den [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/add/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], sette ContentSource til "`Abc`" også fører til at den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A>egenskapen gis alias til `AbcStringFormat`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two most useful values for this property are "Content" and "Header".
trans-unit.target: De to mest nyttige verdiene for denne egenskapen er "Innhold" og "Overskrift".

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: Grunnleggende navnet som skal brukes under automatisk aliasing.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Content".
trans-unit.target: Standard er "Innhold".

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en sammensatt streng som angir hvordan du formaterer det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>egenskap hvis det vises som en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: ContentStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: ContentStringFormat kan være en forhåndsdefinert sammensatte eller egendefinerte strengformat.

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om streng formatene [formateringstyper](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, the ContentStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, ContentStringFormat-egenskapen ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til **true**| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: En sammensatt streng som angir hvordan du formaterer det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>egenskapen Hvis det vises som en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir malen som brukes til å vise innholdet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that defines the visualization of the content.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> som definerer visualiseringen på innholdet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref>, which allows the application writer to provide custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref>, som gjør at programmet writer oppgi tilpassede logikken for å velge malen som brukes til å vise innholdet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen ignoreres hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## XAML tekst-Bruk For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informasjon, se [TemplateBinding Markup filtypen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object that supplies logic to return a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref> objekt som leverer logic å returnere en <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Determines the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object based on the sizing properties, margin, and requested size of the child content.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> objektet basert på egenskapene skalering marger og forespurte størrelsen på innholdet som underordnede.

trans-unit.source: An upper limit value that the return value should not exceed.
trans-unit.target: En øvre grense for verdien returverdien ikke kan overstige.

trans-unit.source: The size that is required to arrange child content.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen som kreves for å ordne underordnede innhold.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Aktiveres når det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> should use <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref> in its style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> skal bruke <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"> </xref> i malen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether serialization processes should serialize the effective value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*> property on instances of this class.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om serialisering prosesser må serialisere effektive verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>egenskapen for forekomster av denne klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>
